= Senior does not mean better =

Someone who is senior does not always know better. For example, a senior might be biased by their own experiences and therefor ignore new arguments.

That doesn't mean that you shouldn't listen to a senior: [[permanent/202108112331-separate-person-from-arguments.md]].
